content:
vertices will no longer be checked for internal integrity. This is
meaningful in non-production builds only. egg-unify bool 1 When this is true, then in addition to flattening the scene graph
nodes, the egg loader will also combine as many Geoms as possible within
a given node into a single Geom. This has theoretical performance
benefits, especially on higher-end graphics cards, but it also slightly
slows down egg loading. egg-unroll-fans bool 1 Set this true to allow the egg loader to convert weak triangle
fans--triangles that share the same vertex but aren't connected enough
to justify making a triangle fan primitive from them--into a series of
zig-zag triangles that can make a triangle strip that might connect
better with its neighbors. egg-vertex-max-num-joints int 4 Specifies the maximum number of distinct joints that are allowed to
control any one vertex. If a vertex requests assignment to more than
this number of joints, the joints with the lesser membership value are
